Title: Relates to hazardous materials emergency response training for incidents involving lithium-ion batteries
Summary: Clarifies the definition of lithium-ion battery in relation to hazardous materials emergency response training for incidents involving such batteries.
LawCode: Amd ยง156-a, Exec L (as proposed in S.8742 & A.9337)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to hazardous materials emergency response training for incidents involving lithium-ion batteries
